title: Tasty spaghetti bolognese
ingredients: ['1 tin (400g) chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried Italian mixed herbs', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 dash Worcestershire sauce', '2 teaspoons tomato purée', '1 teaspoon garlic purée', 'olive oil, to taste', '1 onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '400g minced beef', '1 beef stock cube', '3 whole star anise', '200g to 250g spaghetti', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '100g chorizo, chopped (optional)']
